thread.title: Chelsea star N’Golo Kante in-line for HUGE player rating rise on Fifa 18 Ultimate Team card after another impressive season
thread.title_full: Chelsea star N’Golo Kante in-line for HUGE player rating rise on Fifa 18 Ultimate Team card after another impressive season

author: rforrester
title: Chelsea star N’Golo Kante in-line for HUGE player rating rise on Fifa 18 Ultimate Team card after another impressive season
text:
Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments N’GOLO KANTE’S amazing form for Chelsea this season is set to spark a huge player rating rise on the new FIFA. 
The France international has been instrumental in Chelsea’s season so far as he continues to guide them closer to the Premier League title. Reuters 4 N’Golo Kante is on the verge of winning back-to-back titles with different clubs 
And if he does, he will be the first player to win back-to-back titles with different clubs after Leicester’s heroics last season. 
Keep up to date with ALL the Chelsea news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
And FIFA are set to reward his importance to Antonio Conte’s side by raising his player rating and making him one of the best defensive midfielders on the game. 
Currently with a player rating of 84, Kante’s stock on the game has continued to rise over the years. 4 N’Golo Kante was given an average 72 rating whilst playing for Caen 
In FIFA 15, whilst he was relatively unknown at French side Caen, he was handed an average 72 rating with defensive stats of 64. 
After moving to Leicester, the 25-year-old’s stock rose to 77 with his defensive attributes also rising to 72. The midfielder’s rating increased after his switch to Leicester related articles Preview West Ham vs West Brom: What time is it, what TV channel is it on and what is the team news? Non merci Crystal Palace star rejected chance to join Marseille and link up with ex Hammer Dimitri Payet Preview Stoke vs Crystal Palace: What time is the match and what TV channel is the Premier League clash on? TEAM NEWS Stoke vs Crystal Palace team news: Glen Johnson and Xherdan Shaqiri could both return to boost Potters' squad TV times Stoke vs Crystal Palace: What TV channel and what time is the Premier League clash on? black cats blow Sunderland target Andreas Samaris agrees new four-year deal to stay with Benfica injury news Middlesbrough vs Everton: Victor Valdes will be available for Boro after avoiding FA citation TV TIMES 4 The Frenchman’s stock has continued to rise with the latest updates and now has a 84 rating 
In the latest game, his initial rating of 81 has already increased to 84 with the latest update and that is set to improve even further in the new game. 
Mesut Ozil and Luka Modric are the joint best midfielders on the new game with ratings of 89 whilst the best natural defensive midfielder remains Sergio Busquets with 87. 
But if Kante can get Chelsea over the line as expected, then don’t rule out the powerful midfielder topping the bill in the next game. Check out some of the great goals in EA's first ever goal of the week for FIFA 17
